about_the_game:
Undead Trail: Haunting Shadow is an immersive horror side-scroller that takes players into a haunted mansion filled with secrets and dangers at every turn.


Prepare to confront your deepest fears. Every sound will give you goosebumps, making it a scary adventure you won't forget. Wear headphones for the full effect and be ready!


As you make your way through the mansion's sinister halls, you'll encounter all kinds of undead creatures, from regular zombies to massive giants and lightning-fast foes. Each encounter will challenge your survival instincts, demanding quick reflexes and smart strategies to make it through.


Prepare yourself for intense battles against swarms of zombies! You'll have a variety of weapons at your disposal, each with its own unique abilities to help you fight off the undead. Whether you prefer a stealthy approach, sneaking past zombies undetected, or setting up clever traps like bear traps to catch them off guard.


Undead Trail: Haunting Shadow is a passion project crafted by a single developer, pouring heart, soul, and many sleepless nights into the game. Get involved in the development process by talking directly with the developer on Discord and engage in discussions with other community members.

Welcome to Undead Trail: Haunting Shadow!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains intense violence and gore, horror themes with jump scares, strong language, disturbing imagery, and references to drugs and alcohol. It is intended for mature audiences only. Player discretion is advised.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640 or AMD Radeon HD 6750M
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560X or Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Play as a lone survivor in a creepy mansion overrun by zombies. Fight, solve puzzles, and hide to stay alive. Created by a single developer, this passion project promises a top-tier horror experience.
